{% liquid comment Renders a meganav promoted product item. Required parameters: - promo_width: { Number } The width of the promo area (as a percentage of the parent container). - layout: { String } A string noting the product layout. Can be: - 'list': Products display in a list style. - '2_col': Products display in a grid with 2 columns. - '3_col': Products display in a grid with 3 columns. - '3_col': Products display in a grid with 4 columns. - prod: { Object } The associated product object. - image_aspect_ratio: { String } A string noting the aspect ratio of the product image. - show_product_vendor: { Boolean } Whether the product vendor should show. - show_product_subtitles: { Boolean } Whether the product subtitle should show. - show_product_prices: { Boolean } Whether the product price should show. - show_animations: { Boolean } Whether animations are enabled. Optional parameters: - placeholder: { Boolean } Whether we're rendering a placeholder. endcomment assign promo_image_width = 'calc((100vw - (100% - [[pw]]%) - (clamp(24px, 2vw, 36px) * 2)) / [[pcc]])' | replace: '[[pw]]', promo_width capture image_sizes case layout when 'list' echo '67px' when '2_col' echo promo_image_width | replace: '[[pcc]]', 2 when '3_col' echo promo_image_width | replace: '[[pcc]]', 3 when '4_col' echo promo_image_width | replace: '[[pcc]]', 4 endcase endcapture if image_aspect_ratio == 'use_theme_settings' assign image_aspect_ratio = settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio endif assign placeholder_product_title = 'general.onboarding.product_title' | t assign placeholder_product_subtitle = 'general.onboarding.product_subtitle' | t assign placeholder_vendor = 'general.onboarding.product_vendor_short' | t assign tag = 'a' if placeholder assign tag = 'div' endif capture attributes unless placeholder echo 'href="[[pu]]"' | replace: '[[pu]]', prod.url echo 'aria-label="[pt]"' | replace: '[[pt]]', prod.title endunless endcapture -%} <{{ tag }} {{ attributes }} class="meganav-promoted-products-item" >
{% render 'image', image: prod.featured_media, sizes: image_sizes, aspect_ratio: image_aspect_ratio, include_placeholder: true, show_animations: show_animations -%}
{% if show_product_vendor -%} {% if prod.vendor or placeholder -%}
{{ prod.vendor | default: placeholder_vendor }}
{%- endif %} {%- endif %}

{{ prod.title | default: placeholder_product_title }}

{% if show_product_subtitles -%} {% if placeholder or prod.metafields.descriptors.subtitle != blank -%}

{{ prod.metafields.descriptors.subtitle | default: placeholder_product_subtitle }}

{%- endif %} {%- endif %} {% if show_product_prices -%}

{% render 'product-item-price', prod: prod, placeholder: placeholder %}

{%- endif %}

files.snippets/product-badge.liquid:
{% liquid comment Renders a single product badge for the product page header block and product cards. Required parameters: - text: { String } The badge text. - type: { String } The type of badge Optional parameters: - handle: { String } The handleized version of the badge text. endcomment -%}
{{ text }}
files.snippets/product-badges.liquid:
{% liquid comment Renders product badges for the product page header block and product cards. Required parameters: - prod: { Object } The associated product object. - show_sale_badge: { Boolean } Whether to show the "Sale" badge. - show_sold_out_badge: { Boolean } Whether to show the "Sold-out" badge. - If the "Sold-out" badge should show (ie. is enabled, and the product is sold out), then no other badges will show. - show_new_badge: { Boolean } Whether to show the "New" badge. - show_custom_badges: { Boolean } Whether to show any custom badges. endcomment # TODO: Can we build this list of badge tags once? # Get custom badges for i in (1..4) assign setting_key = 'custom_product_badge_group_[[index]]_tag_names' | replace: '[[index]]', i assign current_tags = settings[setting_key] | split: ',' assign stripped_tags = '' if current_tags != blank for tag in current_tags assign stripped_tag = tag | strip assign stripped_tags = stripped_tags | append: stripped_tag unless forloop.last assign stripped_tags = stripped_tags | append: ',' endunless endfor assign stripped_tags = stripped_tags | split: ',' assign badge_tags = badge_tags | concat: stripped_tags endif endfor assign is_sold_out = false if show_sold_out_badge unless prod.available or placeholder assign is_sold_out = true endunless endif if is_sold_out assign badge_text = 'products.product.sold_out' | t # Output "Sold-out" badge capture badges render 'product-badge', text: badge_text, type: 'sold-out' endcapture else # Output custom badges if show_custom_badges for badge_tag in badge_tags for product_tag in prod.tags assign product_tag_handle = product_tag | handleize assign badge_tag_handle = badge_tag | handleize if product_tag_handle == badge_tag_handle capture badges echo badges render 'product-badge', text: badge_tag, handle: badge_tag_handle, type: 'custom' endcapture break endif endfor endfor endif # Output "New" badge assign new_badge_is_valid = false if show_new_badge and settings.new_badge_product_source == 'collection' assign collection_titles = prod.collections | map: 'title' if collection_titles contains settings.new_badge_collection.title assign new_badge_is_valid = true endif elsif show_new_badge and settings.new_badge_product_source == 'auto' assign days = settings.new_badge_duration_in_days assign period_time = days | times: 24 | times: 60 | times: 60 assign date_now = 'now' | date: '%s' assign date_finished = prod.published_at | date: '%s' | plus: period_time | date: '%s' if date_finished > date_now assign new_badge_is_valid = true endif endif if new_badge_is_valid assign badge_text = 'products.product.new' | t capture badges echo badges render 'product-badge', text: badge_text, type: 'new' endcapture endif # Output "Sale" badge if show_sale_badge and prod.compare_at_price > prod.price capture badge_text render 'get-display-discount', prod: prod, format: settings.sale_badge_format, unstyled: true, use_data_attribute: false endcapture capture badges echo badges render 'product-badge', text: badge_text, type: 'sale' endcapture endif endif -%} {%- if badges != blank -%}
{{ badges }}
{%- endif -%}
files.snippets/product-block-accordion.liquid:
{%- comment -%} Renders an accordion display. Required parameters: - block: { Object } The parent block. - content: { String } Content to display inside the accordion. - heading: { String } The accordion heading. Optional parameters: - classes: { String } A string representing any classes to apply to the accordion container. - disable_max_width: { Boolean } Whether a max-width should be applied. - disable_rte: { Boolean } Whether RTE styles should be applied. - disable_font_class: { Boolean } Whether the built-in font class should be applied. - expand_by_default: { Boolean } Whether the accordion should be open by default. - heading_tag: { String } the heading tag, defaults to h3 {%- endcomment -%} {% liquid assign open = false assign aria_hidden = true assign content_display = 'none' assign heading_tag = heading_tag | default: 'h3' if block.settings.expand_by_default or expand_by_default assign open = true assign aria_hidden = false assign content_display = 'block' endif -%}
{% liquid assign content_class = 'accordion__content' unless disable_font_class assign content_class = content_class | append: ' fs-body-100' endunless unless disable_rte assign content_class = content_class | append: ' rte non-page-rte' endunless if block.settings.page_for_content assign content_page = pages[block.settings.page_for_content] if content_page and content_page != blank assign content = content_page.content endif endif if block.settings.custom_liquid != blank assign content = block.settings.custom_liquid endif -%}
{{ content }}
files.snippets/product-block-buy-buttons.liqui:
{% liquid comment Renders the product buy buttons (ie. "Add to cart" and dynamic checkout). Required parameters: - product: { Object } The associated product object. - block: { Object } The associated block object. - blocks: { Object } The parent section's blocks. - current_variant: { Object } The current variant object. - is_quick: { Boolean } Whether the buy buttons are being rendere inside a quick view (or quick add). - featured_media: { Object } The initial media shown. - aspect_ratio: { String } The value which determines the aspect ratio of the media. Optional parameters: - show_quantity_selector: { Boolean } Whether to show the quantity selector. - This is an override for the quick add modal so that we don't have to have a setting (we always want it). endcomment assign show_quantity_selector = show_quantity_selector | default: block.settings.show_quantity_selector, allow_false: true -%}
{{ 'products.product.quantity_error' | t }}

files.snippets/product-block-complementary-pro:
{%- liquid assign max_products = block.settings.max_products assign should_render_content = false if block.settings.product_source == 'custom-product-list' and block.settings.product_list.count > 0 assign should_render_content = true elsif block.settings.product_source == 'app-recommendations' assign should_render_content = true endif assign has_slider = false assign disable_slider_desktop = true assign disable_slider_mobile = true if block.settings.enable_slider_desktop or block.settings.enable_slider_mobile assign has_slider = true endif if block.settings.enable_slider_desktop assign disable_slider_desktop = false endif if block.settings.enable_slider_mobile assign disable_slider_mobile = false endif -%} {%- if should_render_content -%} {% capture product_items %} {%- for product_item in block.settings.product_list limit: max_products -%} {% assign id = product_item.id | append: '-'| append: block.id %} {% render 'product-item' parent_id: id, prod: product_item, aspect_ratio: settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio, product_columns: 2 %} {%- endfor -%} {% endcapture %} {% capture recommended_product_items %} {%- if recommendations.performed and recommendations.products_count > 0 -%} {%- if recommendations.products_count > 0 -%} {%- for product_item in recommendations.products -%} {% assign id = product_item.id | append: block.id %} {% render 'product-item' parent_id: id, prod: product_item, aspect_ratio: settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio, product_columns: 2 %} {%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%} {% endcapture %} {% capture content %}
{%- liquid assign items = recommended_product_items if block.settings.product_source == 'custom-product-list' assign items = product_items endif -%}
{%- liquid if settings.product_listing_product_list_style == 'bordered_grid' assign gap = 1 assign gap_above_1024 = 1 assign gap_above_1200 = 1 else assign gap = 12 assign gap_above_1024 = 16 assign gap_above_1200 = 24 endif assign columns_above_960 = 2 assign columns_above_1024 = 2 assign columns_above_1200 = 3 if block.settings.column_placement == 'left' assign columns_above_960 = 3 assign columns_above_1024 = 3 assign columns_above_1200 = 4 endif -%} {%- if has_slider -%} {% render 'scroll-slider', navigation_container: '.product__block-complementary-products-wrapper', id: 'complementary-products', slider_items: items, columns: 2, columns_above_720: 3, columns_above_960: columns_above_960, columns_above_1024: columns_above_1024, columns_above_1200: columns_above_1200, gap: gap, gap_above_1024: gap_above_1024, gap_above_1200: gap_above_1200, peek: 24, peek_above_720: 0, full_width_below_720: true, peek_and_full_width_below_720: true, disable_above_1024: disable_slider_desktop, disable_below_1024: disable_slider_mobile, %} {% render 'scroll-slider-navigation-buttons' %} {%- else -%} {{ items }} {%- endif -%}
{% endcapture %}

files.snippets/product-block-description.liqui:
{%- liquid
  comment
    Renders the product description.

    Required parameters:
      - prod: { Object } The associated product object.
      - block: { Object } The associated block object.
  endcomment

  if prod != blank
    assign description = prod.description
  else
    assign description = 'sections.featured_product.placeholder.description' | t
  endif

  assign truncate_num_lines = block.settings.truncate_num_lines
  assign truncate_description = false

  if description != blank and truncate_num_lines != '0'
    assign truncate_description = true
  endif

  capture content
    if truncate_description
      render 'truncate-wrapper', content: description, num_lines: truncate_num_lines, parent_id: block.id
    else
      echo description
    endif
  endcapture
-%}

{% if block.settings.display_as_collapsible_row -%}
  {% render 'product-block-accordion',
    block: block,
    heading: block.settings.title,
    content: content,
    disable_max_width: true,
    disable_font_class: true,
    classes: block.settings.text_font_class,
    heading_tag: 'h2'
  -%}
{%- else -%}
  {%
    render 'product-block-text',
    block: block,
    heading: block.settings.title,
    content: content,
    additional_classes: block.settings.text_font_class,
  -%}
{%- endif %}

{% liquid comment Renders text columns with icons. Required parameters: - block: {Object} The parent block. endcomment assign icon_border_color_name = 'accent' assign icon_text_color = '--color-accent-contrasting' if block.settings.icon_border_color == 'current_text' assign icon_text_color = '--color-background' if block.settings.icon_border_style == 'filled' assign icon_border_color_name = 'text' else assign icon_border_color_name = 'text-alpha-30' endif endif assign item_count = 0 -%} {% capture image_sizes -%} (min-width: 720px) {{ block.settings.icon_size }}px, {{ block.settings.icon_size_mobile }}px {%- endcapture %} {% capture items -%} {% for i in (1..3) -%} {% liquid assign heading_setting_string = 'heading_' | append: i assign text_setting_string = 'text_' | append: i assign icon_setting_string = 'icon_' | append: i assign custom_icon_image_setting_string = 'custom_icon_image_' | append: i assign heading_setting = block.settings[heading_setting_string] assign text_setting = block.settings[text_setting_string] assign icon_setting = block.settings[icon_setting_string] assign custom_icon_image_setting = block.settings[custom_icon_image_setting_string] if text_setting != blank or heading_setting != blank assign item_count = item_count | plus: 1 endif -%} {% render 'icon-with-text-column', source: 'product-block', heading: heading_setting, text: text_setting, icon: icon_setting, custom_icon_image: custom_icon_image_setting, image_sizes: image_sizes, desktop_alignment: 'above_center', shopify_attributes: block.shopify_attributes -%} {%- endfor %} {%- endcapture %} {% capture content -%}
{{ items }}

files.snippets/product-block-variant-picker.li:
{%- liquid comment Renders a product variant picker. Required parameters: - prod: { Object } The associated product object. - block: { Object } The associated block object. Optional parameters: - show_siblings: { Boolean } Whether 'sibling' products should show. endcomment assign swatch_options = settings.swatch_options | downcase | split: ', ' assign chip_options = settings.chip_options | downcase | split: ', ' assign swatch_shape = settings.swatch_shape assign swatch_size = block.settings.swatch_size assign chip_layout = block.settings.chip_layout assign dynamic_options = settings.enable_dynamic_product_options assign file_extension = 'png' # custom swatch colors assign custom_colors = settings.custom_swatch_colors | newline_to_br | split: '
' assign custom_color_map_key = '' assign custom_color_map_value = '' for color_value in custom_colors assign custom_color_key = color_value | split: ':' | first | strip assign custom_color_value = color_value | split: ':' | last | strip assign custom_color_map_key = custom_color_map_key | append: ',' | append: custom_color_key assign custom_color_map_value = custom_color_map_value | append: ',' | append: custom_color_value endfor assign custom_color_map_key = custom_color_map_key | remove_first: ',' | split: ',' assign custom_color_map_value = custom_color_map_value | remove_first: ',' | split: ',' # Merchants often make the mistake of inputting 'sibling_collection' instead of the # documented 'siblings_collection'. We now support both to help with support debt. assign siblings_collection = prod.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_collection.value.products | default: prod.metafields.cornerstone.siblings_collection.value.products case swatch_size when 'small' assign siblings_image_width = 44 | times: 2 when 'medium' assign siblings_image_width = 60 | times: 2 when 'large' assign siblings_image_width = 72 | times: 2 endcase -%} {% comment %} Siblings {% endcomment %} {% if show_siblings and prod.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_option_name and siblings_collection and block.settings.siblings_option_name != blank -%}
{% for sibling_product in siblings_collection -%} {% liquid assign custom_swatch_image = sibling_product.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_option_name | handle assign custom_swatch_image = custom_swatch_image | append: '.' | append: file_extension capture sibling_swatch_styles if block.settings.siblings_show_product_image assign sibling_product_featured_media = sibling_product.featured_media | image_url: width: image_width echo 'background-image: url([[spfm]]);' | replace: '[[spfm]]', sibling_product_featured_media else if custom_color_map_key contains sibling_product.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_option_name for color_name in custom_color_map_key if color_name == sibling_product.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_option_name echo 'background-color: [[cc]];' | replace: '[[cc]]', custom_color_map_value[forloop.index0] break endif endfor else assign formatted_sibling_option_name = sibling_product.metafields.cornerstone.sibling_option_name | downcase | replace: ' ', '' echo 'background-color: [[fson]];' | replace: '[[fson]]', formatted_sibling_option_name endif if images[custom_swatch_image] != blank assign custom_swatch_image_url = custom_swatch_image | file_img_url: '100x100' echo 'background-image: url([[csi]]);' | replace: '[[csi]]', custom_swatch_image_url endif endif endcapture -%} {%- endfor %}
{%- endif %} {% unless prod.has_only_default_variant -%} {%- liquid assign variant_popup_page = pages[block.settings.variant_popup_page] assign variant_popup_content_exists = false assign variant_popup_option = '' if block.settings.variant_popup_option != blank and block.settings.variant_popup_text != blank and variant_popup_page.content != blank assign variant_popup_content_exists = true assign variant_popup_option = block.settings.variant_popup_option | downcase endif -%}
{% for option in prod.options_with_values -%} {%- liquid assign option_name = option.name | downcase assign show_popup_trigger = false assign rendered_popup_trigger = '' assign option_values = '' if variant_popup_content_exists and option_name == variant_popup_option assign show_popup_trigger = true endif -%} {% if show_popup_trigger -%} {%- capture rendered_popup_trigger -%} {% render 'product-block-information-popup' block: block, popup_page_target: block.settings.variant_popup_page, popup_page: variant_popup_page, icon: block.settings.variant_popup_icon, custom_icon_image: block.settings.custom_icon_image, text: block.settings.variant_popup_text -%} {%- endcapture -%} {%- endif %} {% comment %} All inputs that have `name=options[Name]` will be picked up by ProductForm(), registered as an option input, and made available at ProductForm.optionsInputs {% endcomment %} {%- capture option_values -%} {%- endcapture -%} {%- capture rendered_option_inner %} {% if swatch_options contains option_name -%}
{% for value in option.values -%} {% liquid assign custom_swatch_image = value | handle | append: '.' | append: file_extension assign color_swatch_class = 'product__color-swatch' if option.selected_value == value assign color_swatch_class = color_swatch_class | append: ' selected' endif if dynamic_options assign color_swatch_class = color_swatch_class | append: ' dynamic-variant-button' endif capture color_swatch_styles if custom_color_map_key contains value for color_name in custom_color_map_key if color_name == value echo 'background-color: [[cc]];' | replace: '[[cc]]', custom_color_map_value[forloop.index0] break endif endfor else assign formatted_value = value | downcase | replace: ' ', '' echo 'background-color: [[fv]];' | replace: '[[fv]]', formatted_value endif if images[custom_swatch_image] != blank assign custom_swatch_image_url = custom_swatch_image | file_img_url: '100x100' echo 'background-image: url([[csi]]);' | replace: '[[csi]]', custom_swatch_image_url endif endcapture -%} {%- endfor %} {{ option_values }}
{%- elsif chip_options contains option_name -%}
{% for value in option.values -%} {%- endfor %} {{ option_values }}
{%- else -%}
{{ option_values }} {% render 'icon' icon: 'chevron-small', class: 'select-wrapper--icon' %}
{%- endif %} {%- endcapture -%} {%- capture rendered_option -%}
{{ rendered_popup_trigger }}

files.snippets/product-item-swatches.liquid:
{%- liquid comment Renders product item swtaches. Required parameters: - prod: { Object } The associated product object. - option_name: { String } The name of the option to get the swatches from. Optional parameters: - coll: { Object } The associated collection object. - show_quick_view: { Boolean } Whether to show the quick view. endcomment unless prod.has_only_default_variant assign max_items = 5 assign option_name = option_name | downcase | strip_newlines assign show_quick_view = show_quick_view | default: true, allow_false: true unless settings.enable_quick_view assign show_quick_view = false endunless # custom swatch colors assign custom_colors = settings.custom_swatch_colors | newline_to_br | split: '
' assign custom_color_key_map = '' assign custom_color_value_map = '' for color_value in custom_colors assign custom_color_key = color_value | split: ':' | first | strip | downcase assign custom_color_value = color_value | split: ':' | last | strip assign custom_color_key_map = custom_color_key_map | append: ',' | append: custom_color_key assign custom_color_value_map = custom_color_value_map | append: ',' | append: custom_color_value endfor assign custom_color_key_map = custom_color_key_map | remove_first: ',' | split: ',' assign custom_color_value_map = custom_color_value_map | remove_first: ',' | split: ',' endunless -%} {% unless prod.has_only_default_variant -%} {%- capture content -%} {% for product_option in prod.options_with_values -%} {%- assign product_option_name = product_option.name | downcase -%} {% if product_option_name == option_name -%} {% liquid assign overflows = false if product_option.values.size > max_items assign overflows = true assign overflow_amount = product_option.values.size | minus: max_items endif -%}
    {% for value in product_option.values limit: max_items -%} {% liquid assign downcased_value = value | downcase assign named_color = null assign hex_color = null assign color_image = null assign potential_color_image_name = value | handle | append: '.png' assign potential_color_name = downcased_value | downcase | replace: ' ', '' if images[potential_color_image_name] != blank assign color_image = images[potential_color_image_name] endif if custom_color_key_map contains downcased_value for color_name in custom_color_key_map if color_name == downcased_value assign hex_color = custom_color_value_map[forloop.index0] break endif endfor endif capture is_color_keyword_boolean_as_string render 'is_color_keyword', potential_color_name: potential_color_name endcapture if is_color_keyword_boolean_as_string == 'true' assign named_color = potential_color_name endif -%}
  • {% liquid capture swatch_item_attributes unless show_quick_view assign swatch_url = prod.url | within: coll assign variant_option_name = 'option' | append: product_option.position for variant in prod.variants if variant[variant_option_name] == value assign swatch_url = variant.url | within: coll break endif endfor echo 'href="[[su]]"' | replace: '[[su]]', swatch_url endunless # TODO: enable hover and update to show first variant with that swatch as part of 1.1+ comment assign has_hover_interaction = false if named_color or hex_color or color_image assign has_hover_interaction = true endif endcomment # echo 'data-has-hover-interaction="[[hhi]]" | replace: '[[hhi]]', has_hover_interaction echo 'data-swatch-shape="[[ss]]"' | replace: '[[ss]]', settings.swatch_shape echo 'title="[[v]]"' | replace: '[[v]]', value assign swatch_color_style = '' assign swatch_image_style = '' if named_color or hex_color assign swatch_color = hex_color | default: named_color assign swatch_color_style = 'background-color: [[sc]];' | replace: '[[sc]]', swatch_color endif if color_image assign color_image_url = potential_color_image_name | file_img_url: '200x200' assign swatch_image_style = "background-image: url('[[ciu]]');" | replace: '[[ciu]]', color_image_url endif if swatch_color_style != blank or swatch_image_style != blank echo 'style="[[scs]][[sis]]"' | replace: '[[scs]]', swatch_color_style | replace: '[[sis]]', swatch_image_style endif endcapture -%}
    • {%- endfor %} {% if overflows -%}
  • {{ 'general.concepts.overflowing_number' | t: number: overflow_amount }}
    • {%- endif %}
{% break %} {%- endif %} {%- endfor %} {%- endcapture -%} {% if content != blank -%}

files.snippets/product-item.liquid:
{%- liquid comment Renders a product item. Required parameters: - prod: { Object } The associated product object. - parent_id: { String } An ID to be appended to 'product-item' and passed to quick-add-quantity-atc (should be unique). Optional parameters: - coll: { Object } The associated collection object. - show_quick_view: { Boolean } Whether to show the quick view (dependent on 'settings.enable_quick_view'). - has_grid_reveal: { Boolean } Whether the item is part of a grid reveal animation. endcomment assign product_url = prod.url | within: coll assign show_multiple_images = false assign quick_add_enabled = false assign image_link_tagname = 'a' if placeholder assign image_link_tagname = 'div' assign id = 'placeholder' endif if settings.product_listing_show_second_image_on_hover and prod.media.size > 1 assign show_multiple_images = true endif if settings.enable_quick_add and prod.available assign quick_add_enabled = true endif capture image_size_for_columns case product_columns when '5' echo '270px' when '3' echo '450px' when '2' echo '690px' else # Using a 4 item grid as default for sizes echo '304px' endcase endcapture assign sizes = '(max-width: 720px) calc((90vw - 12px) / 2), (max-width: 1400px) calc((93.4vw - (12px * 3)) / [[pc]]), [[isfc]]' assign sizes = sizes | replace: '[[pc]]', product_columns | replace: '[[isfc]]', image_size_for_columns assign item_in_cart = 0 for item in prod.variants assign count_in_cart = cart | item_count_for_variant: item.id if count_in_cart > 0 assign item_in_cart = item_in_cart | plus: count_in_cart endif endfor assign placeholder_product_subtitle = 'general.onboarding.product_subtitle' | t assign show_quick_view = show_quick_view | default: true, allow_false: true if settings.enable_quick_view == false or placeholder assign show_quick_view = false endif assign has_grid_reveal = has_grid_reveal | default: false, allow_false: true assign ratings_visible = false if settings.product_listing_show_star_rating and prod.metafields.reviews.rating_count != blank assign ratings_visible = true endif assign parent_id = 'product-item-' | append: parent_id capture quick_add_button_for_grid render 'quick-add-quantity-atc', parent_id: parent_id, prod: prod, quick_add_style: settings.quick_add_style, item_in_cart: item_in_cart endcapture capture quick_add_button_for_list assign parent_id = 'list-mode-' | append: parent_id render 'quick-add-quantity-atc', parent_id: parent_id, prod: prod, quick_add_style: settings.quick_add_style, item_in_cart: item_in_cart endcapture -%} {% capture quick_view_button %} {% if show_quick_view %} {% endif %} {% endcapture %} {% capture product_price %}

{% render "product-item-price", prod: prod, show_discount: settings.product_listing_show_discount, discount_format: settings.product_listing_discount_format, use_wrapper: false -%}

{% endcapture %} {% capture swatches_display -%} {% if settings.product_listing_show_swatches -%} {% liquid capture first_swatchified_option render 'get-first-swatchified-option', prod: prod endcapture -%} {% render 'product-item-swatches', prod: prod, coll: coll, option_name: first_swatchified_option, show_quick_view: show_quick_view, product_url: product_url -%} {%- endif %} {%- endcapture %}
<{{ image_link_tagname }} class="product-item__image-link" {% unless placeholder %} href="{{ product_url }}" aria-label="{{ prod.title }}" {% endunless %} > {%- liquid assign image_wrapper_class = 'product-item__image' if show_multiple_images assign image_wrapper_class = image_wrapper_class | append: ' product-item__image--one' assign second_image = prod.media[1].preview_image if prod.featured_media != prod.media[0] assign second_image = prod.media[0].preview_image endif endif -%} {% render 'image', image: prod.featured_media, wrapper_class: image_wrapper_class, aspect_ratio: settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio, object_fit: settings.product_listing_media_fit, include_placeholder: true, sizes: sizes, src_set_type: 'grid', prioritize_loading: prioritize_image_loading -%} {% if show_multiple_images -%} {% render 'image', image: second_image, wrapper_class: 'product-item__image product-item__image--two', aspect_ratio: settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio, object_fit: settings.product_listing_media_fit, include_placeholder: true, sizes: sizes, no_lazy_load: true, src_set_type: 'grid' -%} {%- endif %} {% comment %} Can be used for future swatch hover UX {% if settings.product_listing_show_swatches -%}

Can be: - "sale_text" - "percent_off" - "minus_percent" - "save_percent" - "amount_off" - "minus_amount" - "save_amount" endcomment -%} {%- if prod != blank -%} {{ 'products.product.regular_price' | t }} {%- liquid if current_variant.compare_at_price > current_variant.price echo current_variant.compare_at_price | money endif -%} {{ current_variant.price | money }} {% if show_discount -%} {% render 'get-display-discount', prod: prod, variant: current_variant, format: discount_format, wrapper_class: 'product__price-displayed-discount', use_data_attribute: true -%} {%- endif %} {% render 'unit-price', item: current_variant %} {%- else -%} {{ 9999 | money }} {%- endif %}

{% liquid comment Renders the content of a product tabs item. Required parameters: - block: { Object } The parent block. - font_class: { String } A class noting the heading font type. Can be: - 'ff-heading' - 'ff-body' endcomment assign desktop_columns = 1 case block.type when 'two_column' assign desktop_columns = 2 when 'three_column' assign desktop_columns = 3 endcase -%}
1 -%} data-vertical-alignment="{{ block.settings.content_vertical_alignment }}" {%- endif %} > {% case block.type -%} {%- when 'product_description' -%} {% render 'product-tabs-tab-column', block_type: block.type, num_columns: desktop_columns, content_width: block.settings.content_width, custom_width: block.settings.custom_width, heading: block.settings.heading, heading_font_type: font_type, heading_font_size: block.settings.heading_font_size, text_font_size: block.settings.text_font_size -%} {%- else -%} {% for i in (1..desktop_columns) -%} {% liquid assign heading_setting = 'heading_column_' | append: i assign heading_font_size_setting = 'heading_font_size_column_' | append: i assign text_font_size_setting = 'text_font_size_column_' | append: i assign image_setting = 'image_column_' | append: i assign image_width_setting = 'image_width_column_' | append: i assign image_position_setting = 'image_position_column_' | append: i assign custom_liquid_setting = 'custom_liquid_column_' | append: i assign page_for_content_setting = 'page_for_content_column_' | append: i assign text_setting = 'text_column_' | append: i -%} {% render 'product-tabs-tab-column', block_type: block.type, num_columns: desktop_columns, content_width: block.settings.content_width, custom_width: block.settings.custom_width, heading: block.settings[heading_setting], heading_font_type: font_type, heading_font_size: block.settings[heading_font_size_setting], text_font_size: block.settings[text_font_size_setting], image: block.settings[image_setting], image_width: block.settings[image_width_setting], image_position: block.settings[image_position_setting], custom_liquid: block.settings[custom_liquid_setting], page_for_content: block.settings[page_for_content_setting], text: block.settings[text_setting] -%} {%- endfor %} {%- endcase %}
files.snippets/product-tabs-tab-column.liquid:
{% liquid comment Renders a product tab content column. Can contain an image and content, where the content can be: - A heading and text content - Content from a page - Custom Liquid content Required parameters: - block_type: { String } The block type. Can be: - 'product_description' - 'one_column' - 'two_column' - 'three_column' - num_columns: { Number } The number of columns. - content_width: { String } A string noting whether the content should be full-width, or a custom width. Can be: - 'full' - 'custom' - custom_width: { Number } The custom width of the column, in pixels. - heading: { String } The heading to use for the content. - heading_font_type: { String } The heading font type. Can be: - 'ff-heading' - 'ff-body' - heading_font_size: { Number } A number representing a font size, within the heading font scale. - text_font_size: { Number } A number representing a font size, within the text font scale. Optional parameters: - image: { Object } The image. - image_width: { Number } The width of the image, as a percentage. - image_position: { String } The image position (in relationt to the content). Can be: - 'above_text' - 'below_text' - custom_liquid: { Liquid } The custom liquid to use for the content. - page_for_content: { Object } The page to use for the content. - text: { String } The text to use for the content. endcomment assign image_order = 1 assign content_order = 2 if image_position == 'below_text' assign image_order = 2 assign content_order = 1 endif -%}
{% if image != blank -%} {%- endif %}
{% liquid capture content assign content_type = 'text' if block_type == 'product_description' echo product.description else assign content_page = pages[page_for_content] if content_page != blank assign content_type = 'page' echo content_page.content elsif custom_liquid != blank assign content_type = 'liquid' echo custom_liquid else echo text endif endif endcapture -%} {% if heading != blank -%} {% liquid capture heading_font_class render 'settings-text-size', type: 'heading', size: heading_font_size endcapture -%}

{{ heading }}

{%- endif %} {% if content != blank -%} {% liquid assign text_class = 'product-tabs__tab-text ff-body rte' if content_type != 'page' capture text_font_class render 'settings-text-size', type: 'text', size: text_font_size endcapture assign text_class = text_class | append: ' ' | append: text_font_class endif -%}
{{ content }}
{%- endif %}

files.snippets/quick-cart-item.liquid:
{% liquid comment Renders a product item display for the quick cart. Required parameters: - item: { Object } The current line item object. - section_settings: { Object } The parent section's settings. - parent_id: { String } An ID to be appended to 'quick-cart-item' and passed to quantity-input (should be unique). endcomment assign item_aspect_ratio = settings.cart_item_aspect_ratio if settings.cart_item_aspect_ratio == 'use_theme_settings' assign item_aspect_ratio = settings.product_listing_aspect_ratio endif assign parent_id = 'quick-cart-item-' | append: parent_id -%}
{%- render 'image', image: item.image, sizes: '120px', prioritize_loading: true, aspect_ratio: item_aspect_ratio, include_placeholder: true -%}

{{ item.product.title }}

{% liquid # Check for compare at price discount assign has_compare_discount = false assign compare_at_price = item.variant.compare_at_price assign current_price = item.variant.price assign discount_amount = 0 assign discount_percentage = 0 if compare_at_price and compare_at_price > current_price assign has_compare_discount = true assign discount_amount = compare_at_price | minus: current_price assign discount_percentage = discount_amount | times: 100.0 | divided_by: compare_at_price | floor endif # Check if there are automatic discounts applied assign has_auto_discount = false if item.line_level_discount_allocations.size > 0 assign has_auto_discount = true endif -%}
{% if is_bogo_free_item -%} {%- comment -%} This is a FREE item in BOGO - show struck price + Rs. 0.00 {%- endcomment -%} {% liquid assign original_price_display = compare_at_price | money if section_settings.show_product_currency assign original_price_display = original_price_display | append: ' ' | append: cart.currency.iso_code endif %}
{{ original_price_display }} Rs. 0.00{% if section_settings.show_product_currency %} {{ cart.currency.iso_code }}{% endif %}
  • {%- render 'icon', icon: 'discount-badge' -%} BUY 1 GET 1 FREE (-{{ original_price_display }})
{%- elsif is_paid_bogo_item -%} {%- comment -%} This is a PAID item in BOGO - show ONLY compare_at_price (full MRP) {%- endcomment -%} {% liquid assign display_price = compare_at_price | money if section_settings.show_product_currency assign display_price = display_price | append: ' ' | append: cart.currency.iso_code endif %}
{{ display_price }}
{%- else -%} {%- comment -%} Regular pricing - for single items OR 3rd, 5th, 7th+ items in BOGO {%- endcomment -%} {% liquid # Use variant price (not affected by automatic discounts) assign display_price = current_price | money assign compare_price_formatted = compare_at_price | money if section_settings.show_product_currency assign display_price = display_price | append: ' ' | append: cart.currency.iso_code assign compare_price_formatted = compare_price_formatted | append: ' ' | append: cart.currency.iso_code endif %}
{% if has_compare_discount -%} {%- comment -%} Show compare at price (crossed out) {%- endcomment -%} {{ compare_price_formatted }} {%- endif %} {{ display_price }}
{% if has_compare_discount -%} {%- comment -%} Show discount badge matching theme style {%- endcomment -%}
  • {%- render 'icon', icon: 'discount-badge' -%} FLAT ‚Çπ{{ discount_amount | divided_by: 100 }} off
{%- endif %} {%- endif %}
{% render 'unit-price', item: item %}
{% unless item.product.has_only_default_variant -%}

{{ item.variant.title }}

{%- endunless %} {% if item.selling_plan_allocation -%}

{{ item.selling_plan_allocation.selling_plan.name }}

{%- endif %} {%- assign property_count = item.properties | size -%} {% if property_count > 0 -%}
{% liquid for p in item.properties # Don't show property if property name begins with an underscore, or if property is blank. assign first_char = p.first | slice: 0 unless p.last == blank or first_char == '_' capture property_content echo p.first | append: ': ' if p.last contains '/uploads/' echo p.last | split: '/' | last | link_to: p.last else echo p.last endif endcapture echo '

' echo property_content echo '

' endunless endfor -%}
{%- endif %} {% comment %} Hide automatic discount badges when BOGO pricing is applied {% endcomment %} {% unless apply_bogo_pricing -%} {% if item.line_level_discount_allocations.size > 0 -%}
    {% for discount_allocation in item.line_level_discount_allocations -%}
  • {%- render 'icon', icon: 'discount-badge' -%} {{ discount_allocation.discount_application.title }} (-{{ discount_allocation.amount | money }})
    • {%- endfor %}
{% endif %} {%- endunless %}

{{ 'cart.general.error' | t }}

{% if settings.cart_enable_low_inventory_warning -%} {% if item.variant.inventory_management != blank and item.variant.inventory_policy == 'deny' and item.variant.inventory_quantity < settings.cart_low_inventory_warning_threshold -%}

{{ 'cart.general.inventory_warning' | t: amount: item.variant.inventory_quantity }}

{%- endif %} {%- endif %} {% render 'quantity-input', parent_id: parent_id, prod: item.product, initial_value: item.quantity, use_border: true, %}
files.snippets/quick-product-modal-template.li:
{%- comment -%} Renders the base template for product quick add/view modals. {%- endcomment -%}

{% render 'loader', foreground_color_var: '--color-text-popups-drawers', background_color_var: '--color-text-alpha-20-popups-drawers', loader_size: '28px' %}
files.snippets/quick-product-modal.liquid:
{% liquid comment Renders the base structure for product quick add/view modals. Required parameters: - open: { Boolean } Whethe the modal should be open. Optional parameters: - content: { String } The content to be rendered inside the modal. - type: { String } The type of modal. Can be: - 'quick-add' - 'quick-view' endcomment assign modal_wrapper_class = 'quick-product-modal modal popover is-fixed' assign modal_content_class = 'quick-product-modal__content' if open assign modal_wrapper_class = modal_wrapper_class | append: ' is-visible active' else assign modal_content_class = modal_content_class | append: ' empty' endif if settings.enable_section_animations assign modal_wrapper_class = modal_wrapper_class | append: ' animation animation--quick-product animation--quick-product-revealed' endif -%}
{{ content }}
files.snippets/setup-product-item-grid.liquid:
{%- comment -%}
  Renders data attributes and CSS variables for product items.

  Use this snippet within an element's div tag.
  Works in conjunction with the classes `standard-grid-spacing` and `product-item-holder`

    <div
      class="standard-grid-spacing product-item-holder"
      {% render 'setup-product-item-grid' %}
    >
{%- endcomment -%}

{% liquid
  if settings.product_listing_product_list_style == 'colored_tile'
    echo 'style="--product-item-background-color: [[plcct]];"' | replace: '[[plcct]]', settings.product_listing_color_colored_tile
  endif
  echo 'data-standard-grid-spacing-type="product-list"'
  echo 'data-grid-style="[[plpls]]"' | replace: '[[plpls]]', settings.product_listing_product_list_style
  echo 'data-product-item-alignment="[[plca]]"' | replace: '[[plca]]', settings.product_listing_content_alignment
-%}
files.snippets/sticky-atc-bar.liquid:
{%- comment -%} Renders the sticky add to cart bar on the product page. Must be rendered within a product form. Required parameters: * local_settings: { Object } The bar's settings, taken from the buy button block on the product page. * prod: { Object } The product to render with. * current_variant: { Object } The selected_or_first_available_variant of the product. * featured_media: { Object } The initial media shown. * aspect_ratio: { String } The value which determines the aspect ratio of the media. {%- endcomment -%} {%- liquid assign product_available_label = 'products.product.add_to_cart' | t assign product_unavailable_label = 'products.product.sold_out' | t if template.suffix == 'preorder' assign product_available_label = 'products.product.preorder' | t endif capture options_csl for option in current_variant.options echo option unless forloop.last echo ', ' endunless endfor endcapture -%}
{%- for media in prod.media -%}
{% render 'image', image: media, id: media.id, wrapper_class: 'sticky-atc-bar__image', aspect_ratio: aspect_ratio %}
{% endfor -%}
{{ prod.title }}
{%- unless prod.has_only_default_variant %} {{ options_csl }} {% endunless %}
{% render 'product-price', prod: prod, current_variant: current_variant, show_discount: false -%}
